job.description:
If you are a Software Engineer with strong JavaScript (Angular, React, NodeJS) experience, please read on!
Job Title:
Software Engineer - JavaScript (Angular, React, Node.js)
Job Location:
New York City, NY - we're on East 42nd Street just 2 blocks from Grand Central Terminal!
Compensation:
$100K - $140K base salary Depending on Experience
The problems we are solving are challenging and interesting and our solutions have an immediate impact on students and staff at urban schools in NYC. We are looking for an engineer excited about public service and the prospect of joining a fun and growing team in an open, collaborative, and diverse environment.
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Competitive Base Salary ($100K - $140K Depending on Experience)
Comprehensive Benefits Package - FREE health coverage for the employee and competitive rates for family!
The chance to work for a mission-driven organization that supports NYC public education!
Plenty of room to advance and grow your career - the chance to lead and mentor others while you grow your career!
What You Will Be Doing
Responsibilities Include The Following
Our new team member will help build, test and maintain our school management platform built on Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB, supplemented by RXJS, Typescript, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, and other technologies.
Completing programming and designing changes and improvements to our application
Debugging any potential problems that come up and take note of areas that could be a problem down the line
Writing clean code, coming up with new ideas, run tests on new code
-Candidates must be willing to work in Manhattan when offices reopen-
What You Need for this Position
Bachelor's Degree with at least 2+ years (4+ years preferred) of work experience in a production software engineering environment.
Required Tech Stack Experience
JavaScript (ES5 / ES6)
Angular.js / React.js or similar Javascript frontend framework
RESTful API development
Node.js
MongoDB and/or PostgreSQL
CSS / SCSS
Preferred
TypeScript
RxJS / NgRx
GraphQL
Prior experience in education
So, if you are a Software Engineer looking to join a great team, apply today! or send an updated copy of your resume to
